page.title: 01INTRODUCTION
page.content: The area under survey is mainly rural with two dormitary villages of{Harpole and{Kislingbury}which serve the town of{ Northampton}.Set around these villages is farmland which is mainly used for the grazing of sheep and cattle.However,a fair proportion is used for growing crops,mainly oil seed rape. { Geographically,}the area has one main natural feature and one main'man made' feature.The former is the{River Nene which splits the area into two equal halves from west to east.The latter feature is the{M1 Motorway}which was built is in{1963}and serves as the main route to{North}from{London. The main local employer is{Heygates which is a mill.The cereal crops are transported to the mill from all over the country.
